entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:46 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:46 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:46 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
